tasks.title: PHASE 1: Documentation System Setup
tasks.description: Setup and adapt documentation system to be generic boilerplate templates
tasks.details: Adapt existing documentation files, create minimal structure, and setup AGENTS.md

subtasks.title: Adapt Core Documentation Files
subtasks.description: Make documentation files generic and boilerplate-ready
subtasks.details: Remove project-specific references, update paths, ensure generic structure
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify files are generic and don't reference specific project names

subtasks.title: Create Documentation Directory Structure
subtasks.description: Establish minimal documentation structure with essential templates
subtasks.details: Create templates directory, copy required templates, organize structure
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify all template files exist and are properly structured

subtasks.title: Create AGENTS.md File
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive AGENTS.md with task management and workflow documentation
subtasks.details: Document AI agent workflows, task management integration, CI/CD processes
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify AGENTS.md provides complete guidance for AI agents

tasks.title: PHASE 2: Template Project Setup
tasks.description: Create example PRD, tasks, plans, and resources in template-project
tasks.details: Create example files demonstrating proper formats for PRD, tasks, plans, and resources

subtasks.title: Create Example PRD
subtasks.details: Create PRD.txt with proper format showing project overview, requirements, success criteria
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify PRD format is clear and usable as template

subtasks.title: Create Example Task File
subtasks.description: Create example task file using JSON Schema format
subtasks.details: Create example-tasks.json following JSON Schema standard with all required fields
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate JSON Schema compliance and verify all fields are present

tasks.title: PHASE 3: Init Project - Next.js Setup
tasks.description: Initialize and configure Next.js full-stack application
tasks.details: Setup Next.js with TypeScript, Tailwind, App Router, tRPC, Drizzle ORM, and ShadCN UI

subtasks.title: Initialize Next.js Application
subtasks.description: Create Next.js app with TypeScript, Tailwind, and App Router
subtasks.details: Run create-next-app with appropriate configuration options
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify Next.js app starts and builds successfully

subtasks.title: Configure tRPC
subtasks.description: Setup tRPC with server, client, and example routers
subtasks.details: Install tRPC dependencies, create server/client setup, add example router
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify tRPC endpoints work and type safety is maintained

subtasks.title: Configure Drizzle ORM
subtasks.description: Setup Drizzle ORM with multi-provider support
subtasks.details: Install Drizzle, create schema, setup multi-provider connection, create migrations
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify database connection works with SQLite, verify migrations run

subtasks.title: Setup ShadCN UI
subtasks.description: Initialize ShadCN UI with placeholder component structure
subtasks.details: Run shadcn init, create component directory structure, add README
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify ShadCN is initialized and component directory exists

tasks.title: PHASE 4: CI/CD and Workflows
tasks.description: Setup CI/CD workflows and pre-commit hooks
tasks.details: Create GitHub Actions workflows, setup Husky, configure lint-staged, create task validation

subtasks.title: Create GitHub Actions Workflows
subtasks.description: Create workflows for AI docs, build/lint, and Vercel deployment
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify workflows are properly configured and trigger correctly

subtasks.title: Setup Pre-commit Hooks
subtasks.description: Configure Husky and lint-staged for pre-commit validation
subtasks.details: Install Husky, configure lint-staged, create pre-commit hook
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify pre-commit hooks run and validate code before commit

subtasks.title: Create Task Validation Script
subtasks.description: Create script to validate task JSON files against JSON Schema
subtasks.details: Create validate-tasks.js script that checks required fields, status values, dependencies
subtasks.testStrategy: Run validation script on example tasks and verify it catches errors

tasks.title: PHASE 5: Documentation and Finalization
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation and finalize project
tasks.details: Create README files, testing guide, migration guide, and validate complete setup

subtasks.title: Create Init Project README
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive README for init project
subtasks.details: Document technology stack, quick start, project structure, database config, deployment
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify README provides complete project documentation

subtasks.title: Create Main Style Guide README
subtasks.description: Create/update main style guide README with project overview
subtasks.details: Document purpose, structure, how to use template-project and init project
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify README explains project purpose and usage clearly

subtasks.title: Create Testing Guide
subtasks.description: Create development testing guide and validation checklist
subtasks.details: Document how to test boilerplate locally, validation checklist, common issues
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify guide provides clear testing instructions

subtasks.title: Create Migration Guide
subtasks.description: Create step-by-step guide for using boilerplate to start new projects
subtasks.details: Document process to start new project from init, customization checklist, deployment setup
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify guide enables users to successfully create new projects

subtasks.title: Final Validation
subtasks.description: Validate complete setup against all completion criteria
subtasks.details: Check all completion criteria, verify everything works, test deployment
subtasks.testStrategy: Run through complete validation checklist and verify all criteria met
